name: How to Take Off Your Mask / 貴方の仮面の外し方
description: A cute fantasy romance visual novel. One day you discover the other side of your partner you had never known. What is the truth beneath the masks?
minimum_requirements: OS: XP Processor: 1 Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: The perfect gift for that special big guy

Finished human route, and I think it`s nice game to play if you like otome / VN`s with romance. Story is very adorable and cute, scenario focuses on the dilemmas and transformation which the protagonists undergo under the influence our decisions. You can say that game is simple because it has only two routes and one guy to romance, but it has a few nice twists and choices. I recommend this game and I look forward to the next from roseVeRte :)  PS: I was a little disappointed that roseVeRte abandoned its previous graphic style - but I can imagine why.

Kawaii!  A girl finds herself a kitty girl, nyanya! A boy becoming a city guard  Otome with single girl and single guy  And the growing pains they endure as they make choices on what they want to be to themselves and each other.  Went through both routes and enjoyed them. I'm a slow reader and do each storyline at a different time to re-experience it, rather than do it once and skip skip skip to just catch the differences right away. Either way there are still enought differences to give you good story. Choices can lead to a human ending and a kitty ending where the last few chapters have a bit of a different storyline to get to similar ending that is a cliff hanger.  They might have a sequel come out (certainly set up for it) as you get there feeling there's a lot of storyline around the two main characters that you only catch glimpses of. Might have been fun to see more of that, especially Juli's character whom is my favorite.   The art is better than past games from them, IMO.  I can't figure out if there's stock music or new music, some of it seems familair to past games, it's nondescript so can't tell. Good background music, though not something I'd want the soundtrack for.  It was a nice fluffy distraction.

To be honest I hated the Luccretia side of the story. I loved the characters and the music but the Luccretia side felt to pedophilic and boring. The Human side was much more interseting to me and cute. I did enjoy this game though.  Edit: Played through both sides again and the Human side of the story is definitely much better lol
It's cute and has a neko girl and Nya~. (*￣ii￣)

This VN has a powerful transcendence with Lies and hypocrisy whithin it's plot. What amazed me, was the fact that it can turn those attitudes in the most 'cute' / 'adorable' scenario you'll ever see.   Good story with memorable characters.

A very pleasant, pretty game, just as expected of roseVeRte. The story is really nice and enjoyable, although overall plot feels unfinished... I suppose that's because a sequel is planned? But as a story of the heroine and Ronan, it definitely feels satisfying.  Art is very good, although i must admit, i do miss the usual art style. Music is pleasant and i'm absolutely in love with the theme song!  At first i wasn't very sure what to think about characters, but i've grown to like them. Everyone is likeable and well written. My faves are Juli and Mars though, i hope we will see more of them, haha.  In overall, How to Take Off Your Mask is a solid, good game, and i definitely recommend it.
